properties.areaDesc: Christian, KY; Graves, KY; Muhlenberg, KY; Trigg, KY; Todd, KY; Calloway, KY
properties.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued February 8 at 4:28AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
A mid week weather system is forecast to produce widespread rain.
The heaviest rainfall is expected to occur across southern
portions of west Kentucky Wednesday night into Thursday morning.
Areas along and south of a Mayfield to Greenville line could see
up to around and inch and a half of rain.

Given the timing and intensity of the rainfall, this may have the
potential for producing isolated flooding of low lying or poorly
drained locations.

There continues to remain significant uncertainty in the
location, intensity, and movement of this system. This will have
a direct impact on rainfall amounts, so please continue to
monitor forecasts into next week for further assessment of heavy
rain potential.

NWSheadline: Locally Heavy Rain remains possible for the southern border counties of West Kentucky Wednesday night into Thursday morning
